kiyala hariyatama wigraha kara ganna danne nathi unata aayemath liyanna ta hithunaman dannawakohen kohoma patan gaththath hamadeyakma mata galapaganna puluwan waga ee numbaa mage langa inna nisaweni...numbaa ma langa hidina thak kala mata me hamadeyakma apuruwata galapa gannawa kiyala eka mata loku hayiyak waga mama dana gena hitiya.niskarane ayale galan yanna hadapu me jiwitheta numbaa mawathak wenna arthayak wenna sansarema kalakirila jiwithen hanwadu gahichcha jiwithayakata hetak wennamulu lokayama garahapu muhunakata hinawak wenna haki une mata neweyi numbaatamayi....paradal pathak wi jiwithayen gilihila maranayata athawananajiwithayakata heta dawasa gena aawe mama neweyi numbaayinas pudu walin susumak eliyata enna wiriya daraddi e susumata nidahase lokayata wiwara wenna kiyala dunne numbaayi mama neweyi......numbaa mata jiwithaya unanumbaa mage sinahawa una..numbaa mage hamadeyakma unaketiyenma kiwoth numbaa mage mulu lokayama unajiwithe hama deyak ma ekineka paraya eddibidi giya hama balaporoththuwak ma kadan watunu jiwithema hamadeyakma ekathu karala aran aluthen lokaya goda naga ganna haki une an kawara sithuwillak nisawath nowa oba nisaya...jiwithen hamadama parada wenakota minissu hamoma baninnata purudu wela hitiye daiwayataeth kisiwekuth hithuwe na daiwaya nirmanaya karaganneth thamanmayi kiyala...katawath ayithi nathi jiwithayaka katawath oone widihata jiwath wenne nathiwa mata oone widihata jiwath wenna kiyala dunne numbaayi jiwithe ekin eka piliwelakata pelagaswala mula kure idan kiyala dunne numbaayime ewan jiwithaye mularambhayayi.............
